pages.text: Looking to sell some excess elytras? Maybe a fun gag gift that doesn't fit within your shop? Want to buy some blocks you don't want to spend time collecting?$(br2)The Flea Market is the place to put it!

pages.title: What is it?
pages.text: The Flea Market is a collection of tables within the first shopping district. You may sell or request items or blocks that you might not be able to find in the existing shops

pages.title: How to Use It?
pages.text: Place an apple crate (or a sign with your request and exact IGN). Crates must have a sign posted in front stating:$(li)The Item$(li)Your Name$(li)The Date

pages.title: My Crate is Gone?!
pages.text: Crates are removed because... $(li)it was out of stock or otherwise broken$(li)it was competing with a shop in one of the districts$(li)it was 2 weeks or older$(br2)All contents are mailed to the owner via Contact and can be retrieved at the global mailbox.
